cluster_articles.headline: In Kansas City, a tragic end to Super Bowl parade shocks community

cluster_articles.headline: Kansas City shooting stemmed from personal dispute, officials say
cluster_articles.description: The shooting, which police say stemmed from a personal dispute, left one woman dead and 22 people injured as the celebration for the Super Bowl champion Chiefs ended.

cluster_articles.headline: Shooting at Kansas City Chiefs parade leaves 1 dead, 21 injured, officials say
cluster_articles.description: A shooting near the Kansas City Chiefs Super Bowl parade killed 1 person and injured at least 21. Three are in custody, police said.

cluster_articles.headline: Beloved DJ Lisa Lopez-Galvan killed in Kansas City parade shooting

cluster_articles.headline: From jubilation to chaos, here’s how the Kansas City shooting unfolded
cluster_articles.description: At the end of Wednesday’s parade celebrating the Chiefs’ Super Bowl win, fans in Kansas City, Mo., heard the same sound that has haunted celebrations across America: gunshots.

cluster_articles.headline: Chiefs fans tackled suspect after parade shooting
cluster_articles.description: Fast-acting Chiefs fans are being credited with springing into action as the Super Bowl rally and parade turned to chaos with a shooting that killed one woman.
